nodes.text: The Non-Local Compliance Notices Room is smaller than it should be. (pause) Not for how much paper it holds. (pause) Forms racks sag under standardized templates. (pause) An envelope stack sits like it is waiting for hands that never arrive. (pause) One notice is clipped higher than the rest. (pause) Its barcode is too clean. (pause) Too high-contrast. (pause) Like it was printed by a different decade.

The notice is a standardized compliance posting. (pause)
It uses local nouns: facility, operator, responsible party. (pause)
But the verbs are wrong. (pause)
Not “must comply.” More like “will be held.” (pause)
The barcode doesn’t match the room. (pause)
Too precise. No smearing. No aging. (pause)
Like it arrived already archived.

choices.text: (use) Try to scan the barcode at the nearby admin scanner.
(look) File it as ordinary and move on.

nodes.text:
You read the first lines twice because they’re trying not to be accusatory. (pause)

“NOTICE: Non-local compliance condition detected.” (pause)
“Action: Hold state pending documentation.” (pause)
“Reference: [redacted by copy quality].” (pause)

At the bottom, a line repeats like a disclaimer that got promoted: (pause)
“Incorrect service class assignments may affect standing.”

choices.text: (look) File it as ordinary and move on.

nodes.text:
The scanner is older than the barcode. (pause)
You feed the edge under the glass anyway because “unreadable” is a category you can report. (pause)

The scanner chirps once—unhelpfully confident—then prints a stub of metadata: (pause)
“FORMAT: NON-LOCAL” (pause)
“ROUTING: EXTERNAL” (pause)
“STATUS: HELD” (pause)
The rest is blank as if the machine refuses to pretend.

choices.text: (look) File it as ordinary and move on.

nodes.text: You tag the barcode “unfamiliar,” then demote it to “not today.” That’s a professional skill, daily.

You treat the stub like a curiosity, not a warning.
Notice stays clipped. Room stays quiet.

You notice it. You don’t understand it.
You will later wish those were different actions.

effects.value: Notices room: standardized templates; one barcode format unfamiliar. Filed as ordinary.

nodes.text: You leave the notices where they are. (pause) Compliance by not touching them. (pause) The door shuts with soft finality. (pause) An office expects paper to outlive people.
